title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a Budget dataclass system:
- Budget with name, limit, and period
- Expense with amount, category, and date
- BudgetTracker that manages multiple budgets
- Use slots=True and frozen=True appropriately
instructions:
Create a Budget dataclass system:
- Budget with name, limit, and period (frozen)
- Expense with amount, category, and date (frozen)
- BudgetTracker that manages multiple budgets (mutable)
- Use slots=True for memory efficiency

hints.text: Use @dataclass(slots=True, frozen=True) for immutable data. Use field(default_factory=dict) for mutable container defaults.

commonMistakes.mistake: Using mutable default like expenses: list = []

commonMistakes.correction: Use slots=True in all classes in hierarchy
